snippet: The 35 Atlanta public school employees charged in a testing scandal have been released from jail and are awaiting their first appearance in court.
abstract: Thirty five Atlanta public school employees charged in a testing scandal have been released from jail and are awaiting their first appearance in court.
lead_paragraph: The 35 Atlanta public school employees charged in a testing scandal have been released from jail and are awaiting their first appearance in court.

headline.main: Georgia: Defendants in Cheating Scandal Released
headline.print_headline: Georgia: Defendants In Cheating Scandal Released
